amendment.description: To provide funds for the maintenance of the Chicago Sanitary and Ship Canal Demonstration Barrier, Illinois.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3824 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3824 proposed by Senator Obama for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S4014; text: CR S4014) To provide funds for the maintenance of the Chicago Sanitary and Ship Canal Demonstration Barrier, Illinois.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3824 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3824 proposed by Senator Obama for Senator Voinovich.
